actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to authorize the Attorney General of the United States to acquire and exchange information to assist Federal, State, and local officials in the identification of certain deceased individuals.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to acquire information which would assist in the identification of deceased persons and exchange such information with Federal, State, and local agencies.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to authorize the Attorney General of the United States to acquire and exchange information to assist Federal, State, and local officials in the identification of certain deceased individuals.
